item.title: ENLAN Spans The Nation
item.description:
The concept of unifying all your company locations under a single extended LAN is gaining momentum. Instead of grappling with the complexities of managing countless connections for numerous branch offices or retail locations, a single managed network can streamline this process. TW Telecom offers a service called ENLAN, which stands for Extended Native LAN. This service provides users with a high-speed, dependable, and secure network that extends the reach of what is typically considered the WAN or Wide Area Network...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enlan-spans-the-nation/
